amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting Federal wildland firefighters and associated personnel.

vote.text: Amendment SA 316 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 69.
